   "Hey UltraByte, why did you call us up here to the bridge."  
Lobstruck said as he walk through a door to the bridge.

   "Because I have to tell all the crew of the up and coming 
mission."  UltraByte says.

   Just then KanKick sits up and says. "Holy Slag-bot.  We have an 
intruder."

   "A what?  How did an intruder get on this ship in the middle of 
space?"  UltraByte says.

   "I don't know.  What should I do?"  KanKick says.

   "Turn on the cameras, lets see this bot."  UltraByte says.

   KanKick type some buttons as the camera came up on the screen with 
this bot smashing stuff.

   "Lobstruck go to this bot and try to stop it, Snake Eyes, patch me 
through to him."

   "Yes Sir."  Lobstruck says as he walks out the bridge and towards 
the area that this mystery bot is.

   "Yessh Sshir."  says Snake Eyes as he types some keys on a 
keyboard infront of him.  "You are patched through sshir."

   "Good."  UltraByte says as he sends a Comm to the mystery 
bot, "Mystery bot was is your name."

was

the

> more evil than it's ocunterpart.  And it feels a thirst for power 
100 
> fold his so great he can suck the power out of other bots, 
primarily 
> ones like himself.
>

ignore

and

stasis

my

> > BIC:  A Leopard spot male Bot and a black female bot with a red 
back 
> > covered with black polkadots are sitting around a table in the 
mess

> > Liquid Energon and talking.
> > 
> >    "So Lady Right, you let them go?"  Said the Leopard print bot.
> > 
> >    "Yeah Lepord, But a day later I found them and kind of blew 
them 
> > up,"  Says Lady Right.
> > 
> >    "WOW, that is so cool,"  Says Lepord, "The coolest kill I ever 
> got

> > 
> >    Just then Snake Eyes message came through the Comm. Unit.
> > 
> >    "Hey Lady Right lets go to the bridge."  says Lapord as he 
puts

> > 
> >    "Just wait kid, wait until we finish out drink."  Lady Eyes 
says 
> > as she takes another drink of her liquid energon.
> > 
> >    Lepord sits back down and starts to chug his drink.

> > Lobstruck sit in his enlarged room.  He is basically a red bot 
with

> lab 
> > table with thuds of clang where he steps.  He starts to mix some

bridge.

> > >    A black ship with blood red tinted windows slowly crawls 
> through

the

> Predacon 
> > > Symbol on their shoulder.  In the biggest chair, located in the

> > >    
> > >    The bot looks around the bridge.  When the bots eyes looks 
all

> > > way to the left, the bot says, "Kan Kick, are you asleep?"
> > > 
> > >    A lightly tan bot, whos legs are up on his console and his 
head 
> > is 
> > > leaning to the side quickly sits upright while he rubs his

> > > 
> > >    The bot starts to laugh and says, "Don't lie, it's not 
nice."

plating 
> as

no

Sshnake
